column4: how come when I apt-get install ndiswrapper-utils it installs version 1.1 which is old? I do apt-get update but it doesn't find ndiswrapper 1.5.. 1.1 makes my system sluggish
comrad, do you have two sound cards in the machine?
mine lost sound when I had ac97 and my audigy both activated, I de-activated ac97 and sound worked again
use the red line i dont see it otherwise

so how do i no if thats right
Davethe wave what is ac97 never heard of it
Do you have more than one soundcard device enabled? like ac97 and another soundcard? also, double click the speaker icon in the top bar, by the clock
in the volume control click File, and change device, see if there are more than one

i have an integrated sound card
